endpoints.name: Create Customer Wallet
endpoints.description: Mechant endpoint to create wallet for customers.

body.content:
{
    "bvn": "",
    "firstName": "First",
    "lastName": "User",
    "accountPrefix": "11",
    "dateOfBirth": "",
    "phoneNumber": "08020245369",
    "email": "jamis@gmail.com",
    "address": "No 10, Adewale Ajasin University",
    "metadata": {
        "even-more": "Other data",
        "additional-data": "some more data"
    }
}

endpoints.name: Merchant Transactions
endpoints.description:
Get all information about the merchant transactions

`type` can be any of the option below
 - CREDIT
 - DEBIT
 - ALL

Default value for `type` is *ALL*

endpoints.name: Merchant Profile
endpoints.description: Get information about the current logged in Merchant

query.name: merchantId
query.description: optional. Subsidiary merchant transaction to list

query.name: mode
query.description: optional. (Default to PRODUCTION). Transaction mode to show.

query.name: type
query.description: optional. (Default to ALL). Options: ALL, CREDIT, DEBIT. Transaction type to be listed

query.name: status
query.description: Optional. (Default to success). Options: success, failed. Transaction status to be shown

query.name: category
query.description: Optional. Category of transaction to be listed.

query.name: reference
query.description: Optional. Search for transaction by reference.

metadata.description: Implement Wallets seamlessly into your products using our APIs. Build better, smarter and faster.
